Returns: a clone of the CertPathParameters encapsulated by this class.
getParameters().Description: Return a clone of the CertPathParameters encapsulated by this class.

Parameters: CertPathParameters: the CertPathParameters to be used
CertPathTrustManagerParameters(java.secu.Description: Construct new CertPathTrustManagerParameters from the specified parameters. The parameters are cloned to protect against subsequent modification.

ClassDesc: A wrapper for CertPathParameters. This class is used to pass validation settings to CertPath based @B_javax#net#ssl#TrustManager_E@s using the @B_javax#net#ssl#TrustManagerFactory#init_E@ method. Instances of this class are immutable.
